caption: This is a wonderful epic series clip. The background of it is in middle age. In a room, a man and a girl are having a conversation. The man hands a sword to the girl, who plays with it for a while and then sets it aside. They both seem to have a very close relationship. Afterward, the man enters another room and, under his mother's gaze, embraces a young boy who is lying unconscious on a bed.Following this, he goes to the outskirts of the city and talks to another person. They plan to leave together. The scene transitions to a grassy plain, where a group of people on horseback is departing, with the man among them. He looks back at his hometown with a sense of nostalgia but also hope for his future.
